item.title: Films
item.description: Connection Nuri Bilge Ceylan Kuru Otlar Üstüne (AKA About Dry Grasses, 2023) Ahlat Agaci (AKA The Wild Pear Tree, 2018) Kis Uykusu (AKA Winter Sleep, 2014) Emotion La bete (2023) #reincarnation #sci-fi #love #period The Age of Innocence (1993) #feminism #love #period Fairy Tales Tri orísky pro Popelku (AKA Three Wishes for Cinderella, 1973) #family Feminist Antonia (AKA Antonia’s Line, 1995) Hero Share (1953) #western #history The Wild Robot (2024) #animation #sci-fi History Copa 71 (2023) #untold #feminism #documentary Humanitarianism Kolja (1996, Crech) #family #cold-war #comedy #kids Small Things Like These (2024) #religion #oppression Politics Conclave (2024) #religion From Russia with Lev (2024) #documentary Psychology Happy-Go-Lucky (2008) #feminism Redemption Mars Express (2023) #sci-fi #animation #interstellar A Quiet Place: Day One (2024) #horror #sci-fi Ad Astra (2019) #sci-fi #interstellar TO-DO A Private Universe Borgo (2023) Cong jin yihou (2024) The Dead (1987, John Huston)
